dialogue: Flying near the Sun, it's like being close to a massive campfire!
Zooming by Mercury, the speedster of the Solar System!
Passing Venus, it's hot and steamy like a sauna!
Exploring Earth, our beautiful blue home with oceans and mountains!
Approaching Mars, the Red Planet looks dusty and mysterious!
Approaching Jupiter, it's like flying over a massive storm with moons!
Flying past Saturn, its rings sparkle like hula hoops in space!
Passing Uranus, spinning on its side like a cartwheeling planet!
Sailing near Neptune, cold and stormy like icy waves in space!
Oh no! Aliens are attacking! Let's defeat them using our knowledge!
